title: ATypI 2003 conference site launched
content:
The [ATypI conference website](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017223515/http:/www.atypi.org/40_conferences/28_Vancouver) went live today, including draft speaker list and programme. The conference secretariat is now accepting registrations.   
   
Speakers include Robert Bringhurst (keynote), Roger Black, Doyald Young, Erik Spiekermann, Gerard Unger, Gerald Cinamon, Jean-Fran
author: John Hudson
